parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query.

parameters.name: messageId
parameters.description:
The message ID.

This parameter is required if you set queryType to MESSAGE_ID.

parameters.name: messageKey
parameters.description:
The message key.

This parameter is required if you set queryType to MESSAGE_ID.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page.

parameters.name: queryType
parameters.description:
The query type.

Valid values:

*   MESSAGE_ID
*   MESSAGE_KEY
*   TOPIC

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query.
